entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support new .NET 6.0 LINQ features #25570
    type-enhancement, area-query, User Story
  • Support the new SingleOrDefault/FirstOrDefault/LastOrDefault overloads that allow specifying a default #25569
    type-enhancement, propose-punt, area-query, consider-for-next-release
  • Support SQL translation for .Net 6 Linq's MinBy/MaxBy Methods #25566
    type-enhancement, customer-reported
  • Inverse property mapping ignores namespace in partial class property #25565
    customer-reported

Closed

  • Questions about Compiled Models #25576
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Using Cosmos provider OrderBy owned property throw exception togheter with OData #24510
    closed-could-not-reproduce, area-query
  • Cosmos: Add translators for member/methods which map to built-in functions #16143
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, good first issue, area-query, area-cosmos, community-contribution, 6.0.0-rc1
  • Outstanding work for temporal tables #25013
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0-rc1
  • When using DbContextOptionsBuilder.UseModel with a singleton Instance, EF crashes when trying to initialize the model in multiple threads #25205
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • SQLite: "misuse of aggregate: COUNT()" #22911
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • dotnet ef dbcontext optimize as a PreBuild task #25553
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported
  • FromSqlRaw() - inconsistent/incorrect documentation #25567
    closed-fixed, area-docs, area-query

Updated

  • Defining query/query filter throws when using shared type entity type Set overload #24601
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • 6.0 API Reviews #24743
    type-enhancement, area-global, 6.0.0
  • Question on Cosmos DB database provider owned object querying null #24087
    type-bug, blocked, customer-reported, area-query, area-cosmos
  • Contains() in many to many relationships #24470
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Internal exceptions when using .AsSplitQuery #25225
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • OData - GroupBy with empty key is not working correctly #24561
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Query: Consider translating String.Equals(String, StringComparison) for selected values of StringComparison #1222
    type-enhancement, needs-design, area-query, Backlog
  • Consider un-deleting an entity when it has been orphaned and then reparented #19568
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Support the new SingleOrDefault/FirstOrDefault/LastOrDefault overloads that allow specifying a default #25569
    type-enhancement, propose-punt, area-query, consider-for-next-release
  • Support SQL translation for .Net 6 Linq's MinBy/MaxBy Methods #25566
    type-enhancement, customer-reported

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename Scalars to DefaultTypeMapping #25583
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25582
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Allow using STET overload for Set in query filter/defining query #25581
    auto-merge
  • Migrations Bundles: Address API Review feedback #25580
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'main' #25579
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Add regression test for Contains on skip collection navigation #25578
    auto-merge
  • Query: Remove unnecessary convert to IEnumerable for OData #25577
    auto-merge
  • Undelete an entity when it has been orphaned and then reparented #25574
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25573
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix some test determinism issue #25572
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25571
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Fix to #25013 - Outstanding work for temporal tables #25563
  • Make compiled model and runtime initialization thread-safe #25559
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25564
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25575
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Correct FromSqlRaw docs #25568
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25562
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #25561

Updated

  • Rename Scalars to DefaultTypeMapping #25583
  • Query: Remove unnecessary convert to IEnumerable for OData #25577
    auto-merge
  • Query: Allow using STET overload for Set in query filter/defining query #25581
    auto-merge
  • Query: Add regression test for Contains on skip collection navigation #25578
    auto-merge
  • Undelete an entity when it has been orphaned and then reparented #25574
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25582
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'main' #25579
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Migrations Bundles: Address API Review feedback #25580
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25571
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25573
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix some test determinism issue #25572
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 7.5.8 to 8.0.1 #25245
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Approach for referencing conceptual docs #25530
